jd: From: zaid, Panzer zaid.khan@panzersolutions.com Reply to: zaid.khan@panzersolutions.com Hi,How are you doing well!My name is Zaid Khan, and I am a certified LinkedIn Recruiter currently working as a Talent Acquisition Specialist at Panzer Solutions LLC. You can also send me your updated resume and the best contact number for a quick follow-upOracle Database AdministratorAustin TexasCandidates Must be Local to Texas OnlyNOTE : Previous Work Experience with Any State Project is Must For At least 2 OR 3 ProjectsII.
